MiningSupport.1.2: The first hit on the current floor deals splash damage to 3 random surrounding tiles.
MiningSupport.2.2: Hitting a basic tile has a 50% chance not to consume a Treasure Shovel. (Limit: 3 times per floor)
MiningSupport.201.2: For each tile destroyed, deal 1 damage to a random nearby tile. (Limit: once per floor)
MiningSupport.202.2: For each tile destroyed, there is a 77% chance to convert one random basic tile into a fragile tile. (Limit: 2 times per floor)
MiningSupport.203.2: Upon entering the current floor, 3 random basic tiles are converted into fragile tiles.
MiningSupport.204.2: When a treasure is found, 2 random basic tiles are converted into fragile tiles.
MiningSupport.205.2: Every 3 empty tiles destroyed, 1 random basic tile is converted into a fragile tile.
MiningSupport.206.2: For each empty tile destroyed, deal 1 DMG to 2 random nearby tiles. (Limit: once per floor)
MiningSupport.207.2: After destroying a total of 3 empty tiles, 1 tile containing a treasure is marked. (Limit: once per floor)
MiningSupport.3.2: Upon entering the current floor, 3 random basic tiles are converted into fragile tiles.
MiningSupport.301.2: The first hit on the current floor deals splash damage to 3 random surrounding tiles.
MiningSupport.302.2: For each tile destroyed, deal 1 damage to a random nearby tile. (Limit: once per floor)
MiningSupport.303.2: For each tile destroyed, there is a 77% chance to convert one random basic tile into a fragile tile. (Limit: 2 times per floor)
MiningSupport.304.2: When a treasure is found, 2 random basic tiles are converted into fragile tiles.
MiningSupport.305.2: Hitting a basic tile has a 50% chance not to consume a Treasure Shovel. (Limit: 3 times per floor)
MiningSupport.306.2: The first 3 knocks on the current floor trigger double Crit Hit.
MiningSupport.307.2: After destroying a total of 3 empty tiles, 1 tile containing a treasure is marked. (Limit: once per floor)
MiningSupport.4.2: When a treasure is found, 2 random basic tiles are converted into fragile tiles.
MiningSupport.5.2: Every 3 empty tiles destroyed, 1 random basic tile is converted into a fragile tile.
MiningSupport.6.2: The first 3 knocks on the current floor trigger double Crit Hit.
MiningSupport.7.2: After destroying a total of 3 empty tiles, 1 tile containing a treasure is marked. (Limit: once per floor)
